thread.title: Wizards Reportedly Trying to Trade Trey Burke for 2nd-Round Draft Pick
thread.title_full: Wizards Reportedly Trying to Trade Trey Burke for 2nd-Round Draft Pick

author: Scott Polacek
title: Wizards Reportedly Trying to Trade Trey Burke for 2nd-Round Draft Pick
text: Wizards Reportedly Trying to Trade Trey Burke for 2nd-Round Draft Pick Ned Dishman/Getty Images Scott Polacek Featured Columnist February 23, 2017 While the Washington Wizards are in the thick of the postseason race, they are reportedly willing to move Trey Burke in an effort to bolster their draft assets. On Wednesday, Michael Scotto of Basketball Insiders reported the Wizards are asking for a second-round pick in return for Burke in any potential trade. More to follow.
